content: Contact the Payer (<1>{{email}}</1>) to connect the backup service.

comment.text: This key displays a message instructing the user to contact the payer (with their email address inserted) to enable the backup service. It appears within a UI component, likely a warning or informational message, within the Portal Settings. Translators should ensure the phrasing encourages user action and clearly indicates the email address is for the payer's contact.
